name: Ensure Kinesis Data Streams use encryption at rest
body: With server-side encryption, your Kinesis stream producers and consumers don't need to manage master keys or cryptographic operations. Your data is automatically encrypted as it enters and leaves the Kinesis Data Streams service, so your data at rest is encrypted.
remediationDescription: Go through the [AWS documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/streams/latest/dev/what-is-sse.html) to get a deeper understanding of the implications of server-side encryption for Kinesis Data Streams. You can also find there the steps to enable it.
